Flying Bunny is not just any ordinary rabbit; he has the ability to fly by spinning his super long and strong ears to reach the great distance of the skies! Fly with your super bunny ears to the sky and beyond and embrace the spirit of adventure!!!

If you enjoy a good flying game then you will love Flying Bunny!!!

Play Flying Bunny!!!

Have fun!
